DESCRIPTION: After you play a card, gain #b1 #yBeat. At the start of each turn, reset your #yBeat to #b1.
Card effects after #yOn #yBeat X will only occur if the player has exactly X #yBeats.
#yMeasures can obtained by gaining enough #yBeats. They have no effect by themselves.
Add a copy of this card to your hand with #yExhaust and #yEthereal instead of #yRepeat.
#yCued cards exhaust whenever you play another attack. #yCued cards are also equipped with #yExhaust and #yEthereal.
